actions.name: Guard Down

cost.trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

actions.description:
Trigger: At the start of combat or when switched in.

Effect: All valid creatures in range lose -1 DEF for 5 Activations and -1 EVA Stage for 2 Activations. The user's Conversation Skill checks have an additional +10 bonus.
